text: (visvasavantayini! obata viruddhava yuddha karana) pratiksepa karannanva oba hamu vanne nam, (kisi cakitayak nætiva) ovunge kheli kapa damanu. ovunva oba paradava hæriyahot (itiri ayava sira)bharayata gena bænda damanu. in pasuva (ovun venuvata) yamkisi vandiyak ladahot ho nætahot (vandiyak nomætiva ovun kerehi) anukampaven ho at hæra damanu. (mese yuddha karana saturan) tama ayudha bima tabana turu (yuddha karanu). meya (allahge niyogayaki). allah adahas kara tibune nam, (ovun oba samaga yuddha kirimata pæminimata perama) ovungen pali gannata ida tibuni. ehet (yuddhaya magin) obagen samaharekuva tavat samahareku magin piriksanneya. ebævin allahge margayehi kavurun kapanu læba (maranayata) pat vannoda, ovunge (pin æti) kriyavan apate harinne næta. (eyata sarilana phalavipakama denu æta)
